alert.note: Alert for Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:47PM EDT until June 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTSEGO COUNTY... At 347 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gaylord, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gaylord and Otsego Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to rapid drops in visibility and standing water on roadways. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
